body:
I'll probably briefly show a logo during startup, accompanied by a sound logo (#33) before showing the character (#66).

I could have a little fun with the name TheseusJA and display random fake meanings for "JA". Jump Around, Juicy Apples, Jorts Aplenty, Judo Attack etc.

A bit like Minecraft's message of the day thingy.
title: Splashscreens / Logos
